name: Slime For Slime
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Spacebar to Jump, press twice to double jump

'C' to leave a body

'R' to reset the level

TO PLAY:

Unzip the file and run the exe file

Assets Used:

Puzzle Platformer Project - Provided by GameDev.tv for the game jam, was used as a base for the game including all assets within project

Cartoon Jumpy B Sound Effect - fesliyanstudios (https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/sound-effects-search.php?q=jump)

Collecting Money Coins H Sound Effect - fesliyanstudios (https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/sound-effects-search.php?q=coin)

Blood Squirt A2 Sound Effect - fesliyanstudios (https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/blood-squirt...)

Pig In The Mud - By David Renda (https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/cartoon-music/86)
